title: Ticket #5444: Allow user to specify a workflow name
description:
Allow the user to specify a "workflow name", something like this: 

  condor_submit_dag -name my_big_science_run_200 foo.dag

The name should then be put into an attribute in the ClassAd of all jobs (including sub-DAGs) that are part of this workflow.

(At least part of the motivation for this is to allow condor_q to easily find all of the jobs that are part of a given workflow -- TJ wants this.)

Another related possibility is to set DAGManJobId to the DAGMan job's own cluster ID for a top-level DAG. (My only concern with this is whether it might break code, if any, that relies on DAGManJobId being undefined for a top-level DAG.)
